document.full_text: the qaddafi government concluded that any unpleasantness the foreign news media might dig up could not be nearly as bad as the reports circulating when only colonel qaddafi's opponents were talking.
document.title: libya's experiments with a free press often rattle the news media lab rats
lines_and_colors: the qaddafi government concluded that any unpleasantness the foreign news media might dig up could not be nearly as bad as the reports circulating when only colonel qaddafi's opponents were talking.
